name: Plant-a-mole
description:
Warning: This is not a game, just a prototype. Fiddle with it and have fun.

What it's supposed to be:
The gardener has kidnapped your mole family and when you sneaked into his house, you found them in cages. You weren't sneaky enough so gardener caught you but decided to make an agreement. You would grow vegetables for him and he would give you the key in the end.

Grow vegetables and utilize them to protect your farm from dangers of underground world or deliver them to gardener. Your call.

Controls are written in pause menu opened with ESC in the game.

Music & sound effects by
Ted Wennerström
http://www.tedwennerstrom.com
